text: Chenjiagang (), often abbreviated to Chengang (), is a town in Xiangshui County, Jiangsu, China. == Administrative divisions == Map including Chenjiagang (labeled as Chen-chia-chiang ) (1954) On July 3, 2001, Hai'an Ji (海安集乡) was merged into Chenjiagang . No change was made to location names. {| class="wikitable" ! Division names ! Division level !
